name: first_roi_slicesdir
author: FMRIB Centre, Oxford University
description: A utility for generating slice directories for FIRST-ROI.

inputs.description: Input T1-weighted images of the brain (pattern-matched); for example, *_t1.nii.gz
inputs.name: Input T1 images

inputs.description: Input label images corresponding to the T1 images (pattern-matched); for example, *_L_Hipp_first.nii.gz
inputs.name: Input label images

output-files.description: Generated slice directory for the input T1 images
output-files.name: T1 slices directory

output-files.description: Generated slice directory for the input label images
output-files.name: Label slices directory
